mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, ui.nickname, ui.avatar, ui.web_site, c.reply_user_id, ui.nickname as reply_nickname, ui.web_site as reply_web_site, c.id, c.parent_id, c.comment_content, c.create_time FROM tb_comment c LEFT JOIN tb_user_info ui ON c.user_id = ui.id WHERE c.is_review = 1 AND parent_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY c.id ASC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}
